place: Restaurant des Trianons, 5 Place de Rennes (VIe), Gare Montparnasse, Paris
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Nutting: This is to introduce Mr Patrick Tuohy who has painted my father. He will show the photograph. I like it and would like to have your opinion of it. He would like to see your portrait of my wife and also the sketch of me. Sincerely yours James Joyce
